sen.j: 福王 茂十郎（ふくおう しげじゅうろう、1943年（昭和18年）10月18日 -）とは、ワキ方福王流能楽師。
sen.e: Shigejuro FUKUO (October 18, 1943 -) is a Noh actor of the Fukuo school of supporting actors (waki-kata).
Shigejuro FUKUO (October 18, 1943 -) is a Noh actor of the Fukuo school of waki-kata (supporting actors).
sen.cmt: 余分なスペース消去、supporting actors (waki-kata)→waki-kata (supporting actors)としました。
sen.e: Shigejuro FUKUO (October 18, 1943 -) is a Noh actor of the Fukuo school of waki-kata (supporting actors).
The 16th head of the Fukuo school of supporting actors
The 16th head of the Fukuo school.
sen.cmt: of supporting actors削除、ピリオド追加
sen.e: The 16th head of the Fukuo school.
The present head of the school
The present head of the school.
The present head of the school.
His real name is Teruyuki.
His real name is Teruyuki.
His real name is Teruyuki.

sen.j: 十五世福王茂十郎の長男。
sen.e: He is the eldest son of Shigejuro Fukuo the 15th.
He is the eldest son of Shigejuro FUKUO the 15th.
He is the eldest son of Shigejuro FUKUO the 15th.
He was apprenticed to his father.
He was apprenticed to his father.
He was apprenticed to his father.

sen.j: 重要無形文化財総合指定。
sen.e: The general holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property
The general holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property.
The general holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property.
He presides over the Fukuo Nogaku Kanshokai.
He presides over the Fukuo Nogaku Kanshokai.
He presides over the Fukuo Nogaku Kanshokai.

sen.j: 復曲や稀曲にも取り組み、『藍染川』『羅生門』『谷行』『松山鏡』『壇風』『泰山木』を行う。
sen.e: He performed revived and rare pieces of Noh plays such as "Aizome gawa" (The Resurrection of a Woman at Aizome River), "Rashomon," (The Rashomon Gate), "Taniko" (The Valley Rite)," "Matsuyama kagami" (The Mirror of Pine Forest), "Danpu," and "Taizanboku" (The Magnolia).
sen.cmt: 「壇風」の英訳タイトルが不明です。
sen.e: He performed revived and rare pieces of Noh plays such as "Aizome Gawa" (The Resurrection of a Woman at Aizome-gawa River), "Rashomon," (The Rashomon Gate), "Taniko" (The Valley Rite), "Matsuyama Kagami" (The Mirror of Pine Forest), "Danpu," and "Taizanboku" (The Magnolia).
sen.cmt: 不要なクォーテーション消去、"Aizome Gawa""Matsuyama Kagami"、Aizome River→Aizome-gawa Riverとしました。
sen.e: He performed revived and rare pieces of Noh plays such as "Aizome Gawa" (The Resurrection of a Woman at Aizome-gawa River), "Rashomon," (The Rashomon Gate), "Taniko" (The Valley Rite), "Matsuyama Kagami" (The Mirror of Pine Forest), "Danpu," and "Taizanboku" (The Magnolia).

sen.j: 長男が福王和幸、次男が福王知登（ともに能楽師）。
sen.e: Kazuyuki FUKUO is his eldest son; Tomotaka FUKUO is his second son (Both of them are Noh actors).
Kazuyuki FUKUO is his eldest son; Tomotaka FUKUO is his second son (Both of them are Noh actors).
Kazuyuki FUKUO is his eldest son; Tomotaka FUKUO is his second son (Both of them are Noh actors).

sen.j: 三男が福王忠世（サッカー選手）。
sen.e: Tadayo FUKUO is his third son (soccer player).
Tadayo FUKUO is his third son (soccer player).
Tadayo FUKUO is his third son (soccer player).
